Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the flooded airport in the video is not Mumbai or Hyderabad airport, but the Mexico City International Airport.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a video without any additional evidence or information.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which is that the video is not from Mumbai or Hyderabad airport but from Mexico City International Airport.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of the flooding by suggesting that the entire airport is flooded, whereas reports indicate that only a road connecting the city to the airport was affected by floodwaters.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting the same video as depicting different airports (Mumbai and Hyderabad) on different occasions.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the flooded airport in the video is either Mumbai or Hyderabad airport without verifying the accuracy of the information.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
